attributes.action: arrange for Wales to be issued with it's own coins and banknotes if it is too late for Wales to be represented on the new coins being circulated in summer, 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New coins have been designed for the UK. Wales is part of the UK, yet is not represented on the new coins. It is probably too late for an emblem of Wales to be added as they are probably already in production. Therefore, Wales should be issued with their own coins and bank notes.
